snippet: Creighton University violated the Americans with Disabilities Act and the Rehabilitation Act when it failed to provide accommodations requested by a deaf medical student.
abstract: Federal district court jury rules that Creighton University violated Americans with Disabilities Act and the Rehabilitation Act when it failed to provide accommodations requested by deaf medical student Michael Argenyi.
lead_paragraph: Creighton University violated the Americans with Disabilities Act and the Rehabilitation Act when it failed to provide accommodations requested by a deaf medical student.
